message:
Hi {{ doc.employee_name }},

We hope you are settling in well! This is a friendly reminder to complete your onboarding activity as part of the New Joinee Checklist. Your successful completion of these tasks will help you get up to speed with everything you need to start your journey with {{ doc.company }}.

Onboarding Checklist:

  • Deadline: {{ doc.onboarding_deadline }}
  • Please make sure to complete all the activities listed in your portal.

If you have any questions or need assistance, don't hesitate to reach out!

Best regards,
The {{ doc.company }} HR Team
name: Onboarding Activity Reminder
subject: Reminder: Complete Your Onboarding Activity
